When using Documenter.jl, how can I reference an overloaded abstract type in a `@docs` block? E.g., for a method like this:
```abstract type A end
struct B <: A
    x
end
"""
    Some nice doc-string I want to reference!
"""
(a::A)(y) = a.x + y```
How would I reference the last method in a `@docs` block?
